results.definition: a prominent attribute or aspect of something
examples: the map showed roads and other features

results.definition: the principal (full-length) film in a program at a movie theater
(linguistics) a distinctive characteristic of a linguistic unit that serves to distinguish it from other units of the same kind

examples: This restaurant features the most famous chefs in France

results.definition: a special or prominent article in a newspaper or magazine
examples: they ran a feature on retirement planning

results.definition: wear or display in an ostentatious or proud manner
the characteristic parts of a person's face: eyes and nose and mouth and chin
examples: an expression of pleasure crossed his features

results.definition: an article of merchandise that is displayed or advertised more than other articles
